channel.title: Quarantine on Gerard McGarry
channel.description: Recent content in Quarantine on Gerard McGarry

item.title: Life Under Lockdown
item.description: Life comes at you fast. At the start of 2020, the world had never heard of Coronavirus. By March, terms like “social distancing” and “flattening the curve” were part of everyday conversation. We entered nationwide lockdown, keeping to our houses as much as possible and watched anxiously for news of the virus at home and abroad. The impact of this pandemic is almost impossible to comprehend. International travel at a virtual standstill.
